name: Discogs lighter dark
description: A lighter dark style for Discogs with different shades of grey background, orange hyperlinks and red headings.
additional_info: This is a rather primitive userstyle only changing as little as possible. Use at your own risk. Chances are that some objects may not be not styled well. For me it works well so far. You may occasionally experience nonsense like white text on white background and similar issues. Since I use this style, I will continuously improve it and fix bugs that I encounter.
